Abdullah Selim
Full Stack Web Developer
abdalla.selim.97@gmail.com  +201010114997  503 Azza st, Zahraa Nasr City, Cairo, Egypt  
https://www.linkedin.com/in/abdalla-selim-80502511a/  
PROFILE
As an aspiring full-stack web developer, I bring passion, dedication, and a hunger for learning to the table.
My goal is to contribute my skills and creativity to real-world projects, making a meaningful impact in the
tech industry. With a solid foundation in both front-end and back-end development, I am ready to tackle
challenges head-on and collaborate with like-minded professionals.
PROJECTS
YelpCamp Show APP
YelpCamp is a web app which allows users to post a campground image and review it 
besides that all registered users can review it too.
•User Authentication12/2023 – 03/2024
•User Authorization
•Database Handling
computerized maintenance management system (CMMS)
A computerized maintenance management system (CMMS) is software that centralizes 
maintenance information and facilitates the processes of maintenance operations.
•Developed a desktop app for maintenance data, enhancing the efficiency of 
repair operations.09/2019 – 06/2020
•Automated work order generation, scheduling, and assignment, significantly 
reducing administrative tasks.
•Enabled real-time access to maintenance histories, manuals, and checklists 
through a dedicated mobile application.
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
Senior Technical Support Engineer
IDG
Installation, Calibration and Maintenance of dental imaging04/2021 – present
cairo, Egypt
machines.
